Uses of Class
checkersMain.CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent

Packages that use CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent
checkersGUI Provides the components for a GUI to allow a user to interact with the classes used to simulate a Checkers game. 
checkersMain Provides the main classes and interfaces needed to simulate a Checkers game.

Uses of CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent in checkersMain
 

Methods in checkersMain with parameters of type CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent
 void CheckersGameListener.gameEnded(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that the checkers game has ended.
 void CheckersGameListener.gameStarted(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that the checkers game has started.
 void CheckersGameListener.pauseStateChanged(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that the pause state of the source has changed.
 void CheckersGameListener.player1Changed(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that the CheckersPlayerInterface for Player1 has changed.
 void CheckersGameListener.player2Changed(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that the CheckersPlayerInterface for Player2 has changed.
 void CheckersGameListener.plyTaken(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that a CheckersBoard.Ply has been taken.
 void CheckersGameListener.plyTimeChanged(CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent ce)
          Notifies the listener that the remaining time for the current CheckersPlayerInterface to take its ply has changed.
